content.value: My process usually begins by understanding the core idea or challenge of a project.
From there, I break it down into key stages: research, structure, design, content, development, and testing.
To stay focused and flexible, I organize and prioritize tasks using a hybrid approach — combining Scrum principles with the Eisenhower Matrix.

I work in tight feedback loops, regularly presenting progress to clients or stakeholders to ensure alignment throughout. Each round informs the next — whether that means refining wireframes, adjusting layouts, or rethinking functionality. This loop continues until we reach a polished, functional result — or until the deadline calls for delivery.
